response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me and has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. I believe its true worth lies in the experiences and benefits it can bring to its owner, which is why I am confident it would be a valuable addition to your collection.

Considering its exceptional quality and the unique features it offers, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to me and its perceived worth to you, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information about the product. I am more than happy to provide detailed specifications, testimonials from previous users, or arrange for a personal demonstration to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
